import React from "react" import PropTypes from "prop-types" import Link from "next/link" import "./style.scss" const Card = ({ title, description, image, imageAlt, href }) =>
{image && }

{title}

{description}
Card.defaultProps = { imageAlt: "" } Card.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, description: PropTypes.string, image: PropTypes.string, imageAlt: PropTypes.string, href: PropTypes.string.isRequired } export default Card
